db:select.doc:name: Select CATALOG
db:select.db:sql: SELECT ALBUM.title as ALBUM_NM, ALBUM.publication_dt AS ALBUM_PUBLISH, SONG.song_title as SONG_TITLE, SONG.genre AS SONG_GENRE, SONG.duration AS SONG_DURATION, ARTIST.group_nm as GROUP_NM, ARTIST.last_nm AS ARTIST_LAST, ARTIST.first_nm AS ARTIST_FIRST, DATE_FORMAT(ARTIST.birth_date, "%Y-%m-%d") AS ARTIST_BIRTH, ifnull(ARTIST.death_date,"") AS ARTIST_DEATH FROM bc_album ALBUM LEFT OUTER JOIN bc_artist ARTIST ON ALBUM.group_nm = ARTIST.group_nm LEFT OUTER JOIN bc_song SONG ON SONG.artist_nm = ARTIST.group_nm WHERE ARTIST.group_nm LIKE :groupName GROUP BY ALBUM_NM, SONG_TITLE, ARTIST_LAST ORDER BY ALBUM_NM, SONG_TITLE, ARTIST_LAST
